title: Meteorite
summaries: Meteorite is a type of ore mined from Meteorite crash sites. Crash sites are not generated upon world creation, but instead generate throughout the game based on certain conditions. Mining Meteorite requires a Tungsten Pickaxe or better. [img:Desktop version] [img:Console version] [img:Old-gen console version] [img:Mobile version] Additionally, Meteor Heads also have a 2% chance to drop a single piece of Meteorite, though only in pre-Hardmode.
Crash sites can occur anywhere, accompanied by a status message "A meteorite has landed!". Meteorite is required to craft Meteorite Bars.

Contact with Meteorite blocks causes the player to be inflicted with the <linked>Burning</linked> <linked>debuff</linked>, unless the player has the <linked>Obsidian Skull</linked> accessory (or its upgrades) equipped, or is using an <linked>Obsidian Skin Potion</linked>. Meteorite can be mined without these defenses, and the ore is safe to collect once mined.

Any area with at least (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 75 / (Old-gen console version) 50 / (3DS version) 23 Meteorite blocks in close proximity (e.g. a natural crash site) becomes a Meteorite biome, which will spawn Meteor Heads.
